qualifications.institution: THE INSTITUTE OF CUSTOMER RELATIONSHIP MANAGEMENT

employments.duties:
•	Receive and answer telephone inquiries
•	Receive and process customer telephone orders and/or changes
•	Communicate effectively via phone and email with customers
•	Track packages
•	Making use of the Order Management System software(OMS) to manage Customer orders
•	Making use of Zendesk to communicate with customers via mail.

•	Identifying new sales leads
•	Pitching products and/or services
•	Maintaining fruitful relationships with existing customers
•	Researching organisations and individuals online (especially on social media) to identify new    leads and potential new markets
•	Researching the needs of other companies and learning who makes decisions about purchasing
•	Planning and overseeing new marketing initiatives

referencecontacts.name: ADEREMI ADEYANJU
referencecontacts.job_title: GENERAL MANAGER IMAX CINEMA/ FILM BOOKING MANAGER

address: No 5, Sir Johnson Asinuga Street Off Alpha Beach Road, Lekki Peninsula ii, Lagos.
introduction: Experienced Customer Service Representative with a demonstrated history of working in the consumer services industry. Skilled in Microsoft Word, Advertising, Sales, Team Building, and Public Speaking. Strong support professional with a Master’s Degree focused in MASS COMMUNICATION/ Msc PRAD from University of Lagos.
